sqm.title: SQM
sqm.tips: When enabled, your router intelligently manages network traffic to prevent any single device or application from using too much bandwidth. This reduces latency and buffering for faster browsing, clearer calls, and smoother gaming.
sqm.upload_tips: Set your maximum upload and download speeds first (input range: 1–10000) for traffic scheduling. Match them to your actual internet bandwidth for the best results.
sqm.network_acceleration_warning: This feature cannot work together with {network}. Enabling it will automatically disable Network Acceleration to ensure proper operation.
sqm.client_speed_limit_warning_tips: This feature cannot work together with Client Speed Limit. Enabling it will automatically remove all client speed limits.

qos.title: QoS
qos.tips: When enabled, your router prioritizes bandwidth for critical applications (e.g., video calls, online classes, gaming), ensuring smooth performance even during peak network usage.
qos.sqm_enable_warning: QoS is unavailable because $$$$SQM$$$$ is enabled.
qos.mode_title: Allocate bandwidth based on application priority.
qos.meeting_priority_desc: Prioritize video conferences for a smooth and uninterrupted experience.
qos.gaming_priority_desc: Prioritize online games to avoid lag and packet loss.
qos.web_browing_priority_desc: Prioritize web browsing for faster and smoother loading.
qos.video_priority_desc: Prioritize video streaming for buffer-free playback and HD quality.
qos.custom_drawer_tips_two: Note: Higher priority traffic is forwarded first, followed by lower priority traffic.
qos.education_description: Including online learning platforms, academic resources
qos.work_description: Including remote-desktop, file-sharing, mail, financial, reference
qos.social_entertainment_description: Including news, messaging, social-media, entertainment, recreation, sports, streaming-media
qos.shopping_description: Including e-commerce, online shopping, payment, social-media, shopping
qos.advertisement_description: Including advertising networks, tracking platforms, promotional content
qos.other_description: Including cybersecurity, device-iot, government, technology, telco, cybersecurity, vpn-and-proxy, unclassified

flowstatistics.flowstatistics_tips: When Data Statistics is enabled, it tracks application traffic on the router and connected clients, displaying apps in descending order of total usage. You can view detailed data for each app and block individual apps if needed.
flowstatistics.page_warning: Please enter a valid page number(1-{totalPage})
flowstatistics.app_block_tips: App blocking is powered by Content Protection.

contentprotection.contentprotection_tips: When enabled, your router automatically blocks adult, gambling, and malicious websites, creating a clean, safe online environment for your family.

dpifeatures.trial_open_other_warning: DPI Features conflict with {network} and cannot be used at the same time.
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_description_second_text: View apps ranked by total bandwidth consumption.
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_description_third_text: Access detailed usage data for each app.
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_description_fourth_text: Block specific apps with one click.
dpifeatures.contentprotection_description_first_text: Automatically block adult, gambling, and malicious websites.
dpifeatures.feedback_description_tips: Please describe the specific problems you have encountered in detail, which will help you solve them reasonably.
dpifeatures.dpi_descriptionn_first_text: The DPI function of GL.iNet is currently in the Beta stage, providing the functions of Data Statistics, Content Protection and QoS.
dpifeatures.dpi_descriptionn_second_text: Upgrade to Premium and unlock powerful features: see which apps use your bandwidth, prioritize what matters most, and keep your family safe with advanced online protection. Smarter, faster, safer — all in one subscription.
dpifeatures.trial_expired_text: Your trial period has expired. Please log in to GoodCloud to subscribe.
dpifeatures.subscription_expired_text: Your subscription has expired. Please log in to GoodCloud to subscribe.
dpifeatures.subscription_trial_status_tips: Trial is active. Upon expiration, it will sync with the subscription status of your cloud account.
dpifeatures.trial_expiring_soon_first_text: Your trial is about to expire.
dpifeatures.trial_expiring_soon_second_text: Want to keep enjoying all features? Subscribe now.
dpifeatures.trial_expiring_first_text: Your trial is about to expire.
dpifeatures.subscription_expiring_soon_first_text: Your subscription is about to expire.
dpifeatures.subscription_expiring_soon_second_text: Do you want to renew it now to continue enjoying all features?
dpifeatures.premium_features_first_text: Track which apps are using your bandwidth.
dpifeatures.premium_features_third_text: Shield your family with advanced online protection.
dpifeatures.all_in_one_subscriptio_label: Smarter, faster, safer — all in one subscription！
dpifeatures.reactivation_guide_first_description: Click the 'Activate Subscription Now' button above to start the process.
dpifeatures.reactivation_guide_second_description: You will be redirected to our secure subscription portal, GoodCloud, to manage your license.
dpifeatures.additional_notes_second_text: To continue using the DPI feature after the trial, please subscribe via the GoodCloud platform, which currently supports a one-click 2-year subscription.
dpifeatures.additional_notes_third_text: Since the DPI feature conflicts with Network Acceleration, both cannot be enabled simultaneously. When DPI is enabled, the system will automatically disable Network Acceleration to ensure stable and proper operation.
dpifeatures.trial_activation_fourth_title: Enabling Data Statistics and Content Protection
dpifeatures.reactivation_guide_third_description: Follow the on-screen instructions in GoodCloud to select your plan and complete the subscription purchase.
dpifeatures.reactivation_guide_fourth_description: Once your subscription is active, your advanced DPI features will be reactivated automatically.
dpifeatures.please_try_again_label: Please try again or contact technical support.
dpifeatures.trial_valid_description: Your trial period ends on {time}. Link your cloud account now to seamlessly upgrade to a full subscription and get a 2-year subscription period.
dpifeatures.subscription_valid_description: Your subscription package is currently in effect and will expire on {time}. All subscription functions have been unlocked.
dpifeatures.trial_expired_description: Your trial period has ended, and all advanced DPI features are currently paused. To continue using these features, please reactivate your subscription.
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_card_text: Data Statistics offers an intelligent traffic insight dashboard that categorizes and visualizes network usage by applications, helping you monitor real-time and historical traffic for better network awareness and control.
dpifeatures.contentprotection_descriptionn_card_text: Content Protection provides smart online safety powered by DPI classification, automatically blocking harmful or malicious websites to keep your network clean and secure.
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_description_text: Data Statistics offers a clear dashboard that identifies network usage by applications and protocols, lets you view traffic history for 1 hour, 1 day, or 7 days, see detailed usage rankings, check per-device traffic, and block unwanted apps with one click.
dpifeatures.contentprotection_descriptionn_text: Content Protection is an intelligent online safety feature powered by DPI classification that automatically blocks harmful or malicious websites, helps maintain a clean and secure network environment, and supports custom rules to block specific apps, domains, or IP addresses.
dpifeatures.qos_description_text: QoS (Quality of Service) intelligently optimizes bandwidth usage during network congestion by prioritizing critical application traffic such as video calls and gaming, reducing latency under limited bandwidth conditions, and enhancing overall network responsiveness.
dpifeatures.additional_notes_first_text: After activating the trial, you will enjoy 30 days of full-feature access. When the trial ends, the DPI feature will be automatically deactivated, but your configurations will be fully retained. Once subscribed, you can continue without reconfiguration.
dpifeatures.qos_description_card_text: QoS (Quality of Service) optimizes bandwidth allocation by prioritizing critical applications such as video calls and gaming, reducing latency, and improving overall network performance.
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_notstart_label: A traffic insight dashboard that identifies and categorizes network usage by applications.
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_notstart_description_firs: View real-time and historical traffic for up to 7 days
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_notstart_description_seco: Time filter options: 1 hour / 1 day / 7 days
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_notstart_description_thir: Detailed application-level statistics ranked by total usage
dpifeatures.flowstatistics_notstart_description_four: View how much traffic each device uses for each application
dpifeatures.contentprotection_notstart_label: A smart online safety feature powered by DPI classification.
dpifeatures.contentprotection_notstart_description_f: Automatically blocks harmful or malicious websites
dpifeatures.contentprotection_notstart_description_s: Helps provide a clean and secure network environment
dpifeatures.contentprotection_notstart_description_t: Supports custom rules for blocking specific apps, domains, or IP addresses
dpifeatures.qos_notstart_label: Optimizes bandwidth usage when the network is congested.
dpifeatures.qos_notstart_description_first_text: Prioritizes critical application traffic such as video calls and gaming
dpifeatures.qos_notstart_description_second_text: Reduces latency during limited bandwidth conditions
dpifeatures.subscription_expired_description: Your subscription period has ended, and all advanced DPI features are currently paused. To continue using these features, please reactivate your subscription.
